# UIContextMenuInteraction.appearance.rich

**Case**

A modal menu with an optional preview.

## Declaration

```swift
case rich
```

## Constants

- **UIContextMenuInteraction.appearance.unknown**: No menu appearance.
- **UIContextMenuInteraction.appearance.compact**: A nonmodal, compact menu with no preview.

items.description: A nonmodal, compact menu with no preview.
items.name: UIContextMenuInteraction.appearance.compact
